name: Hawlucha

passive.name: Si Rudo Si Technico
passive.effect: If Hawlucha has a Dark Energy and no Fighting Energy attached to it, you may shuffle it into your deck at any time. Discard any attached cards if you do this.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each damage counter on Hawlucha.

attacks.name: Flying Press
attacks.effect: This attack is Flying and Fighting type.

flavor: These Luchador Pokemon have very different styles. Some fight honorably, but some are cheats and liars. They choose their mask based on what fits their style better.
